buy a sheet of origami paper. fold the paper in half diagonally and make a crease. make a diagonal crease in the lower left corner and fold it over. flip the page over and fold the top right corner over. turn the paper over. fold it in half in the opposite direction. fold one corner of the triangle across at a 45° angle. reverse fold the crease you just made and tuck the corner into the paper. make the corner point back on itself. turn over the paper and make the same fold from the other side. make another diagonal fold and orient the paper so that the point points upward. make an outside fold along the outside edge.
